text: Tumhi tara ase ahata ki tyancyasi prema rakhata, pana te tumacyasi prema rakhata nahita, tumhi allahaca sampurna grantha manuna gheta ani (te nahi manata, tara maga prema kase?) He tumacyasamora tara apale imana kabula karatata, parantu jevha ekate asatata tevha ragane apalya botanca cava ghetata. Tyanna sanga, marala aseca ragacya bharata! Sarvasrestha allaha manatalya supta gostihi cangalya prakare janato
